Potential cause(s):
* AMD/NVIDIA  accelerators are not present.
* GPU drivers are not installed including Rocm and CUDA.
* OMNIA telemetry service encountered an exception.
Command:
For NVIDIA GPU: ``nvidia-smi --query-gpu=temperature.gpu --format=csv,nounits``

For AMD GPU: ``rocm-smi -t --csv``

Potential cause(s):
* AMD/NVIDIA  accelerators are not present.
* GPU drivers are not installed including Rocm and CUDA.
* OMNIA telemetry service encountered an exception.
Command:
For NVIDIA GPU: ``nvidia-smi nvidia-smi --query-gpu=utilization.gpu --format=csv,nounits``

For AMD GPU: ``rocm-smi -u --csv``

Potential cause(s):
* AMD/NVIDIA  accelerators are not present.
* GPU drivers are not installed including Rocm and CUDA.
* OMNIA telemetry service encountered an exception.
Command:
For NVIDIA GPU: ``nvidia-smi nvidia-smi --query-gpu=utilization.gpu --format=csv,nounits``

Comments: Value is average of utilization value of all GPUs
